metadata.title: CVE-2023-2598 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the fixed buffer registration code for io_uring(io_sqe_buffer_register in io_uring/rsrc.c) in the Linux kernel that allowsout-of-bounds access to physical memory beyond the end of the buffer. Thisflaw enables full local privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
